SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into app (AppId, `Name`, OrgId, OrgName, OwnerName, OwnerEmail, IsDeleted, DataChange_CreatedBy, DataChange_CreatedTime, DataChange_LastModifiedBy, DataChange_LastTime ) values (#{appid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{owneremail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{datachangeCreatedby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{datachangeCreatedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{datachangeLastmodifiedby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{datachangeLasttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update app set AppId = #{appid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `Name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OrgId = #{orgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OrgName = #{orgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OwnerName = #{ownername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OwnerEmail = #{owneremail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IsDeleted = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, DataChange_CreatedBy = #{datachangeCreatedby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DataChange_CreatedTime = #{datachangeCreatedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DataChange_LastModifiedBy = #{datachangeLastmodifiedby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DataChange_LastTime = #{datachangeLasttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select Id, AppId, `Name`, OrgId, OrgName, OwnerName, OwnerEmail, IsDeleted, DataChange_CreatedBy, DataChange_CreatedTime, DataChange_LastModifiedBy, DataChange_LastTime from app where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
